articles.title: Canada–U.S. trade negotiations at critical stage, Carney says
articles.description: Talks in Washington are focused on sectoral relief from tariffs and discussions to revive the Keystone oil pipeline

articles.title: Facing record debt levels, Ontario hospitals told to balance budgets and find efficiencies
articles.description: Planning documents raise the possibility that service changes or bed reductions in some hospitals could be on the table.

articles.title: Peru: Chicha Cumbia, the electric pulse of Lima
articles.description: Photographers and storytellers Karla Gachet and Ivan Kashinsky document cumbia music in Colombia, Mexico, Ecuador, Peru, Argentina and the United States.

articles.title: Blue Line drivers accept company offer, ending Ottawa taxi strike
articles.description: The vote ends a strike that has been underway since Sept. 19.
